sentences.en: " Courses, tops'ls, and flying - jib, sir. "
sentences.cn: “ 大横帆 、 中桅帆 、 三角帆, 船长. ”

sentences.en: As the boat approached we could see its jib more clearly.
sentences.cn: 船开过来时,我们可以更清楚地看到船头的三角帆.

sentences.en: At present Vietnam shoe kind the order of 30 % already jib.
sentences.cn: 目前越南鞋类30%之订单已遭移转.

sentences.en: Check for signs telescopic tank can endure the Jib elongation length, whether the leakage phenomenon.
sentences.cn: 作标志检查伸缩臂油缸能否持久保持臂杆伸长长度, 有无泄漏现象.

sentences.en: Fuzzy Reliability Analysis of Railway Crane Telescopic Jib under Stochastic Load.
sentences.cn: 随机载荷作用下铁路起重机伸缩臂模糊可靠性分析.

sentences.en: I must say I didn't like the cut of his jib.
sentences.cn: 说实在的,我不喜欢他那个样子.

sentences.en: I see you are a sailor by jib.
sentences.cn: 我从外表上能看患上出来你是个水手.

sentences.en: It changes working radius usually by luffing jib.
sentences.cn: 通常多采用俯仰臂架的方法来实现工作幅度的改变.

sentences.en: Overbrace jib crane with adjustable hoist. Swing range can be shown.
sentences.cn: 带有可调节提升机的上支撑动臂起重机. 可显示旋转范围.

sentences.en: Reliability sensitivity of jib with bending and torsion stiffness failure modes was proposed.
sentences.cn: 讨论了起重臂在弯曲刚度和扭转刚度失效模式下的可靠性灵敏度设计问题.

sentences.en: The design methods are expounded of equalizing horizontal and balancing deadweight for the jib - bridge system.
sentences.cn: 阐述了对臂桥架 变幅 系统的水平位移补偿、臂桥架自重平衡的设计方法.

sentences.en: This is popularly called sailing under “jib and jigger”—the jigger being an old square-rigger term for the aft-most mast flying a triangular sail.
sentences.cn: 这种航行法常被叫做“jib and jigger”——jigger是对于船尾桅杆上的三角帆的古老叫法。

sentences.en: This mast held an iron stay upon which to hoist a jib - sail.
sentences.cn: 这条桅杆下面由几条铁索结结实实地绑着,上面有条铁支柱,用来支撑这面巨大的布帆.

sentences.en: This paper introduces the technique for welding machine vehicle on portal jib crane.
sentences.cn: 文章介绍龙门吊小车轨道焊接工艺.

sentences.en: Underbrace jib crane with adjustable hoist . Swing range can be shown.
sentences.cn: 带有可调节绞车的下支撑悬臂起重机. 可显示旋转范围.

sentences.en: We set the flying jib and cracked on.
sentences.cn: 我们扯起三角帆,顺风行驶.

words.tran_cn: 改变帆的方向；顺风转向
踌躇不前；停止不动；移转

trans.tran_cn: 艏三角帆，主帆前的小帆，（起重机的）悬臂，挺杆
trans.tran_en: a small sail in front of the large sail on a boat

trans.tran_cn: <过时，非正>不愿做，不肯接受，移转
